edu.cmu.lti.oaqa.bio.resource_wrapper.resource_dao
Interface ResourceDataAccessObject

public interface ResourceDataAccessObject

Method Summary
 java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> getSynonyms(java.lang.String termQuery)
          Get all the synonyms for the requested term from the resource.

          Get the top Term result from the resource.

Method Detail

getTerm

Term getTerm(java.lang.String termQuery)
Get the top Term result from the resource. The top result is determined by the search function for that resource.

Parameters:
termQuery - String to query the resource for
Returns:
Term object populated with TermRelationships from the resource

getTerm

Term getTerm(java.lang.String termQuery,
             boolean exact)
Get the Term that exactly matches the query parameter.

Parameters:
termQuery - String to query the resource for
exact - true to enable exact matching, false to default to getTerm(String)
Returns:
Term object populated with TermRelationships from the resource

getTerms

java.util.Collection<Term> getTerms(java.lang.String termQuery)
Get the top 5 Term results from the resource.

Parameters:
termQuery - String to query the resource for
Returns:
Collection of Term objects populated with TermRelationships from the resource

getTerms

java.util.Collection<Term> getTerms(java.lang.String termQuery,
                                    int amountRequested)
Get the top Term results, amount specified by amountRequested.

Parameters:
termQuery - String to query the resource for
amountRequested - the number (int) of Terms to return
Returns:
Collection of Term objects populated with TermReationships from the resource

getSynonyms

java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> getSynonyms(java.lang.String termQuery)
Get all the synonyms for the requested term from the resource. Must strictly enforce exact matching to prevent wayward synonyms.

Parameters:
termQuery - String to query the resource for
Returns:
Collection of synonym Strings from the resource
